name: Performage Wand Juggling
text:
You can only use this Skill's second effect once per turn and twice per Duel.
1: You cannot Special Summon (excluding Special Summons from the Extra Deck) monsters except for "Performage" and Level 4 Spellcaster monsters.
2: You can activate one of the following effects.
● Add 1 "Wonder Wand", 1 "Bound Wand", or 1 "One-Shot Wand" at random from outside your Deck to your hand, and then place 1 "Performage" monster from your hand to the bottom of the Deck.
● Add 1 "Performage" monster from your Deck to your hand, and then place 1 "Wonder Wand", 1 "Bound Wand", or 1 "One-Shot Wand" from your hand to the bottom of the Deck.
